text:
I am not good at writing economic papers, and it does not match the major I want to apply for (nature science).
I have a plan to study higher mathematics in the future, so it will be a better choice for me to spend the time of economics courses on science study. In addition, the total number of subjects has also exceeded the demand of the target major
trans:
I am not very skilled at writing economic papers, and economics is not related to the major I plan to apply for (natural sciences).
Since I intend to study advanced mathematics in the future, it would be a better use of my time to focus on scientific studies instead of economics courses. Furthermore, the total number of subjects I am taking has already exceeded the requirements for my target major.
